landpred 1.2

Estimate Variance of Coefficients

var.fun.Rd

Estimates the variance of the coefficients for the short-term GLM using a perturbation resampling method.

Usage

var.fun(t, data.v, tau, s, h, vmat, Ainv, weight = NULL, transform = identity)

Arguments

t

The target time for the short-term covariate (usually t_s).

data.v

The data frame used for estimation.

tau

The landmark time.

s

The prediction window.

h

The bandwidth.

vmat

A matrix of perturbation weights.

Ainv

The inverse information matrix from the model fit.

weight

Optional weights.

transform

Transformation function.

Value

A list containing the estimated standard errors for the intercept and slopes.
